nodes.text: An individual was an Imperial prisoner on the planet Kethmandi. Sometime before 10 BBY,[source?] the individual escaped from a prison train with the help of the Wookiee Chewbacca, who sacrificed his own freedom to save the prisoner.

The individual was first mentioned in the 2018 book Solo: A Star Wars Story: A Junior Novel. The non-canon television series LEGO Star Wars: All-Stars later identified the prisoner as Lena Freemaker, the wife of Pace Freemaker, the mother of Kordi, Zander and Rowan Freemaker and paternal grandmother of Moxie Freemaker.
